name: Chung-Ta King
content: Chung-Ta King's Homepage Chung-Ta King (ª÷¥ò¹F) Professor of Department of Computer Science (retired) National Tsing Hua University Hsinchu, Taiwan, 300 Phone: +886-3-574-2804 Fax: +886-3-572-3694 Office: Room 640, Delta Building Email: king at cs.nthu.edu.tw About me Publications Teaching Spring 2023: CS4100 (Computer Architecture) Spring 2022: CS4100 (Computer Architecture) Spring 2021: CS4100 (Computer Architecture) Fall 2020: CS4101 (Introduction to Embedded Systems) Spring 2020: CS4100 (Computer Architecture) Fall 2019: CS4101 (Introduction to Embedded Systems) Spring 2019: CS4100 (Computer Architecture) Spring 2019: CS5100 (Advanced Computer Architecture) Fall 2018: CS4101 (Introduction to Embedded Systems) Spring 2018: CS4100 (Computer Architecture) Spring 2018: CS5100 (Advanced Computer Architecture) Spring 2017: CS5100 (Advanced Computer Architecture)) Fall 2016: CS4101 (Introduction to Embedded Systems) Spring 2016: CS5102 (High-Performance Computer Systems) Fall 2015: CS4101 (Introduction to Embedded Systems) Fall 2014: CS5100 (Advanced Computer Architecture) Fall 2014: CS4101 (Introduction to Embedded Systems) Spring 2012: CS2403 (Programming Languages) Fall 2009: CS1356 (Introduction to Information Engineering) Fall 2008: CS1103 (Practice of Electrical and Computer Engineering) Fall 2008: CS2422 (Assembly Language and System Programming) Research My research interestes included parallel and distributed processing, computer architecture, and embedded systems. My research results can be seen from my publications.
